Title: Crank
Overview: Chev Chelios, a hit man wanting to go straight, lets his latest target slip away. Then he awakes the next morning to a phone call that informs him he has been poisoned and has only an hour to live unless he keeps adrenaline coursing through his body while he searches for an antidote.
Tagline: There are a thousand ways to raise your adrenaline. Today, Chev Chelios will need every single one.
Keywords: poison, helicopter, assassin, nudity, hitman, adrenalin, fistfight, swimming pool, revenge, shootout, motorcycle, drug, cell phone, car chase, though guy, pharmacy, defibrillation, hospital gown, emergency room, aftercreditsstinger, sweatshop, run, epinephrine
production_companies: Lions Gate Films, Lakeshore Entertainment, GreeneStreet Films, Radical Media
Cast: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Jose Pablo Cantillo
